thread.title: BRIEF-Tecogen Inc Says Co Entered Into Membership Interest Purchase And Wind-Down Agreement

title: BRIEF-Tecogen Inc Says Co Entered Into Membership Interest Purchase And Wind-Down Agreement

organizations.name: brief-tecogen inc says co entered into membership interest

text:
March 30, 2018 / 8:13 PM / Updated 8 minutes ago BRIEF-Tecogen Inc Says Co Entered Into Membership Interest Purchase And Wind-Down Agreement Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
March 30 (Reuters) - Tecogen Inc: 
* TECOGEN INC SAYS ON MARCH 27, CO ENTERED INTO MEMBERSHIP INTEREST PURCHASE AND WIND-DOWN AGREEMENT AMONG TEDOM AS, TEDOM USA INC AND TTCOGEN LLC 
* TECOGEN INC SAYS PURCHASE AGREEMENT FOLLOWS MUTUAL AGREEMENT OF PARTIES TO TERMINATE JOINT VENTURE BETWEEN COMPANY AND TEDOM 
* TECOGEN-PURCHASE AGREEMENT ALSO GRANTS CO AND TTCOGEN EXCLUSIVE RIGHT TO MARKET, SELL, DISTRIBUTE TEDOMâ€™S MICRO T35 COMBINED HEAT AND POWER EQUIPMENT Source text: ( bit.ly/2uzoetB ) Further company coverage:
